price: She said, “How can I have a son when no man has touched me, nor have I ever been unchaste?”
arabic: قَالَتۡ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞ وَلَمۡ أَكُ بَغِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
